sourcesContent:
<template>
    <canvas ref="chart"></canvas>
  </template>
  
  <script>
  import { Chart } from 'chart.js/auto';
  
  export default {
    props: {
    chartData: {
      type: Object,
      required: true,
    },
  },
  mounted() {
    const ctx = this.$refs.chart.getContext('2d');
    const myChart = new Chart(ctx, {
      type: 'line',
      data: this.chartData,
      options: {
        responsive: true,
        maintainAspectRatio: false,
      },
    });
  },
  }
  </script>
